# Laxative

## Pronunciation

- /ˈlæk.sə.tɪv/

## Meanings

### Noun

Any substance, such as a food or in the form of a medicine which has a laxative effect.

### Adjective

Having the effect of moving the bowels, or aiding digestion and preventing constipation.
